page_number_formatting.description: Use en dashes (–) for page ranges in references and in-text citations
page_number_formatting.changed_from_apa6: No change - en dash usage remains consistent
common_errors: Using hyphens (-) instead of en dashes (–)
Using em dashes (—) instead of en dashes

page_number_formatting.description: Format single page numbers with 'p.' prefix and no dash
Use article numbers when page numbers are not available for online journal articles
page_number_formatting.changed_from_apa6: Clarified preference for article numbers over omitting page information
common_errors: Omitting location information when article numbers are available

page_number_formatting.description: Format chapter page ranges with 'pp.' prefix in edited book references
common_errors: Forgetting to include page numbers for chapters
Using chapter numbers instead of page ranges

page_number_formatting.description: Use paragraph numbers with 'para.' prefix for direct quotes from online sources without page numbers
page_number_formatting.changed_from_apa6: Clarified usage for web sources and online materials
common_errors: Using section headings instead of paragraph numbers when available

in_text_citations.description: Parenthetical citations place author and year in parentheses, separated by comma
common_errors: Omitting the comma between author and year
Including middle initials unless needed for clarity

in_text_citations.description: Narrative citations integrate author into sentence text with year in parentheses
common_errors: Putting both author and year in parentheses
Using 'according to' redundantly with narrative format

in_text_citations.description: Direct quotes require author, year, and page number separated by commas
common_errors: Omitting page numbers for direct quotes
Forgetting quotation marks around the quoted material

in_text_citations.description: Paraphrased content requires author and year, but page numbers are optional
in_text_citations.changed_from_apa6: Made page numbers optional for paraphrases
common_errors: Including page numbers when not emphasizing specific location

in_text_citations.description: Multiple authors (2) use ampersand in parentheses, 'and' in narrative
Organization authors use full name in first citation, abbreviations thereafter
common_errors: Using abbreviation without defining it first

in_text_citations.description: Anonymous works use 'Anonymous' as author with year in parentheses
common_errors: Treating anonymous works as having no author

in_text_citations.description: Secondary sources use 'as cited in' format with original and secondary authors
examples: Smith's study (as cited in Johnson, 2020) showed...
in_text_citations.changed_from_apa6: Clarified to use secondary source in reference list
common_errors: Citing original source directly without reading it
Including original source in reference list

in_text_citations.description: Multiple works in same citation separated by semicolons in alphabetical order
Direct quotes with page numbers use comma before page information
common_errors: Forgetting page numbers for direct quotes

reference_list_formatting.description: Alphabetical ordering by first author's surname, then by year
common_errors: Ordering by first name instead of surname
Not maintaining chronological order for same author

reference_list_formatting.description: Hanging indent format: first line flush left, subsequent lines indented 0.5 inches
examples:
Smith, J. (2020). Title of work. Publisher.
    Additional information about the source.
common_errors: Using block paragraphs instead of hanging indent
First line indentation instead of hanging

reference_list_formatting.description: Multiple works by same author ordered by year, earliest first
examples:
Johnson, A. (2018). Title one.
Johnson, A. (2019). Title two.
Johnson, A. (2020). Title three.
common_errors: Ordering by title instead of year
Mixing authors when should be grouped

reference_list_formatting.description: Same author, same year distinguished by lowercase letters (a, b, c) after year
examples:
Smith, J. (2020a). First work.
Smith, J. (2020b). Second work.
common_errors: Using uppercase letters instead of lowercase
Not ordering suffixes alphabetically by title
Forgetting to include the suffix in in-text citations

reference_list_formatting.description: Use 'et al.' for 3 or more authors in reference list (all names listed in APA 6)
examples: Johnson, A., Smith, B., & Williams, C. (2020).
reference_list_formatting.changed_from_apa6: MAJOR CHANGE: Now uses et al. in reference list for 3+ authors (APA 6 listed up to 7 authors)
common_errors: Listing all authors when should use et al.
Using et al. for only 2 authors

reference_list_formatting.description: Double spacing within and between reference list entries
examples: All reference entries should be double-spaced with no extra spacing between entries
common_errors: Adding extra blank lines between entries

reference_list_formatting.description: Author name inversion: surname first, followed by initials with periods
common_errors: Including middle names instead of initials

reference_list_formatting.description: Double spacing between reference list entries (consistent with APA formatting)
examples: Reference entries are double-spaced with consistent spacing between all entries
common_errors: Adding extra space after certain entry types
